originalText.text: The braids were terrible big and bulky just ugly I got short length bob box braids worst braids I ever got in my life I remember sitting all the way in the back and another worker sat across from me and started saying why was i staring at her (in her language) she really got so upset yelling  my braider explained she was mad because she thought I was looking at her oh please  she wanted to fight me and I‚Äôm just looking at her act a fool whole time unbothered because I would of kicked her ssa up and down that shop but never again I let my braider pull me from the station and follow her here for this experience I‚Äôll stick to who I go to nice clean updated shop right on Adam Clayton Powell
